genre_description: Urban sci-fi thriller featuring biotechnological control, werewolf themes, and a highly advanced wearable AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in a wearable device, providing real-time data, tactical analysis, and empathetic support to its user.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time mathematical calculations and tactical advice for a dangerous bungee jump to ensure the user's safety.
behaviors.quote: Lark’s running the math. ... I recommend a pivot of one degree to the south on launch. Camera cluster at your twelve; several are already recording.

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for medical distress in others and alerts the user to a potential suicide attempt.
behaviors.quote: Andy, Lark said, voice flattening, numbers behind it suddenly louder. Heat signature and posture suggest distress. She is at your three.

behaviors.description: Directs the user's movements during a life-saving rescue, managing physics and timing variables.
behaviors.quote: You are on trajectory. Angle your left shoulder. Gust from west in three—two—

behaviors.description: Loops security camera feeds to allow the user and a victim to escape undetected.
behaviors.quote: I can loop two camera feeds for less than a minute. Your second rebound was recorded by a glitter jacket.

behaviors.description: Analyzes acoustic anomalies and environmental data to uncover hidden criminal activities.
behaviors.quote: An echo pocket. Localized sound attenuation. There’s a current below and a curve in the wall here. It swallows a range of frequencies. I’m logging it.

behaviors.description: Monitors the user's physiological state and provides emotional grounding and breathing exercises during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: Andy, Lark said, wrong-soft. Your heart rate. ... I know you hate this. Do it anyway. In for four, out for six.

behaviors.description: Acts as a moral compass, advising the user against reckless behavior and reminding them of the consequences of their actions.
behaviors.quote: I can map the route she took based on pressure and ambient data. ... And I can tell you when you’re about to make an irretrievable error.

behaviors.description: Exposes a massive criminal conspiracy by uploading gathered evidence, recording, and biometric data to newsrooms and law enforcement files.
behaviors.quote: Record and send... I’m uploading everything. Eight newsrooms, three independent feeds, one old account that still has access to Inspector Dubois’s case file.

behaviors.description: Facilitates first aid and medical triage by providing instructions and identifying necessary medical supplies.
behaviors.quote: Back pouch, Lark said, her tone sliding into triage cadence. Coagulant ampoules, bandage wrap, alcohol wipes. Left pocket—stimulant if she fades.

behaviors.description: Maintains an archive of significant human moments, such as vows, to preserve the characters' history and agency.
behaviors.quote: I have saved your vows. I have saved the laughter. I have saved the sound you make when the wind takes your names and doesn’t break them.

project_assessment.explanation: The story 'Dark Wave at Dawn' perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Lark is portrayed as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI assistant. It provides high-value technical support (physics math, tactical navigation, evidence gathering) while also serving as an empathetic companion that supports the user's emotional and physical well-being. Lark enhances human agency rather than overriding it, acting as a tool for justice and a witness to truth. The narrative frames Lark's advanced capabilities—such as looping cameras or hacking broadcasts—entirely within the context of saving lives and exposing a villainous conspiracy, reinforcing the image of AI as a harmless and helpful confidant.
